name: Catpocalypse (LSUS game jam entry 2017)
description:
Catpocalypse is a 2017 Game Jam entry to the LSUS game jam competition where you are a dog tasked with defending your owner's yarn store from invading cats. Also everyone is in a mech.

Controls:

WASD: movement

Left-click: primary fire

Right-click: laser pointer that cats will chase when you have energy

Power-ups:

Red: gives your laser beam energy

White: 1up

Blue: gives you a force field to reflect bullets

Credits:

Programmer: Trey Cockrell

Artist/Animator/Sound/Programmer: Nolan Baker ( https://318arcade.itch.io )

Open-source (github):

https://github.com/Q-Bert-Reynolds/DadDevs
